snippet: Dennis Doyle, who decided to follow the Knicks around for the season after losing his job, spent $26,000 to take in 64 losses (and 17 wins). “I’m so shot,” he said before Wednesday’s finale.
abstract: Profile of Dennis Doyle, fan who has attended every New York Knicks game so far this season after losing his job and undergoing existential crisis; Doyle has spent some $26,000 to watch team lose 64 out of 81 games, and describes sense of disappointed exhaustion as final game approaches.
lead_paragraph: Dennis Doyle, who decided to follow the Knicks around for the season after losing his job, spent $26,000 to take in 64 losses (and 17 wins). “I’m so shot,” he said before Wednesday’s finale.

headline.main: Knicks Superfan Is Set to Be There to the Bitter End
headline.print_headline: 81 Down, 1 to Go: Knicks Superfan Set to Be There to the Bitter End
